<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Redirect Attention](/Feats.aspx?ID=3805) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Reflection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=431" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 121</row>

</column>

---

Through your strong connection with your progenitor, you're able to redirect those attempting to spy on you. Whenever you would be directly targeted with a [scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=141) effect, the effect must attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the higher of your spell DC or class DC. If the check fails, the effect targets your progenitor instead of you.
name: Redirect Attention
